page.title: 05HOSPITALS
page.content: {Health in Whitchurch.}It costs a million pounds to run the Cottage Hospital,2 million for Deermoss every year.{Deermoss Geriatric Hospital}was the old town workhouse. The chapel is now the physiotherapy room.In the day room there were old people having cups of tea.They cannot look after themselves so they get heartbroken because they are lonely and 64 nurses look after them.{The Cottage Hospital has 20 nurses and 6 doctors.Seven consultants from Shrewsbury attend both hospitals.In the occupational therapy room people make baskets and pots.They have a lecture room for nurses to keep up with the latest knowledge.{Patients go to Shrewsbury for major treatment.The hospital makes sure patients homes are safe before they return. Social and voluntary workers help the hospitals.
